summary: This bill, the Tsunami Warning, Research, and Education Act of 2025, reauthorizes and amends the Tsunami Warning and Education Act. It focuses on improving tsunami detection, forecasting, and warning capabilities. Key changes include updating alert systems, increasing NOAA Weather Radio coverage, enhancing data management, and bolstering research programs. The bill also authorizes appropriations for the program for fiscal years 2026-2030, with specific allocations for state-level activities and research.
